info.title: Flickr Groups API
info.description: The API for managing Flickr Groups

get.description: Browse the group category tree, finding groups and sub-categories.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: cat_id
parameters.description: The category id to fetch a list of groups and sub-categories for. If not specified, it defaults to zero, the root of the category tree.

1.description: Category not found - The value passed for cat_id was not a valid category id.

95.description: SSL is required - SSL is required to access the Flickr API.

96.description: Invalid signature - The passed signature was invalid.

97.description: Missing signature - The call required signing but no signature was sent.

98.description: Login failed / Invalid auth token - The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

99.description: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions - The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.

100.description: Invalid API Key - The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

105.description: Service currently unavailable - The requested service is temporarily unavailable.

106.description: Write operation failed - The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.

111.description: Format xxx not found - The requested response format was not found.

112.description: Method xxx not found - The requested method was not found.

114.description: Invalid SOAP envelope - The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.

115.description: Invalid XML-RPC Method Call - The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.

116.description: Bad URL found - One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

get.description: Post a new reply to a group discussion topic.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Pass in the group id to where the topic belongs. Can be NSID or group alias. Making this parameter optional for legacy reasons, but it is highly recommended to pass this in to get faster performance.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to post to the topic.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: The ID of the topic to post a comment to.

1.description: Topic not found - The topic_id is invalid.

95.description: SSL is required - SSL is required to access the Flickr API.

96.description: Invalid signature - The passed signature was invalid.

97.description: Missing signature - The call required signing but no signature was sent.

98.description: Login failed / Invalid auth token - The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

99.description: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions - The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.

100.description: Invalid API Key - The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

105.description: Service currently unavailable - The requested service is temporarily unavailable.

106.description: Write operation failed - The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.

111.description: Format xxx not found - The requested response format was not found.

112.description: Method xxx not found - The requested method was not found.

114.description: Invalid SOAP envelope - The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.

115.description: Invalid XML-RPC Method Call - The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.

116.description: Bad URL found - One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

2.description: Cannot post to group - Either this account is not a member of the group, or discussion in this group is disabled.rn

3.description: Missing required arguments - The topic_id and message are required.

get.description: Delete a reply from a group topic.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Pass in the group id to where the topic belongs. Can be NSID or group alias. Making this parameter optional for legacy reasons, but it is highly recommended to pass this in to get faster performance.

parameters.name: reply_id
parameters.description: The ID of the reply to delete.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: The ID of the topic the post is in.

1.description: Topic not found - The topic_id is invalid.

95.description: SSL is required - SSL is required to access the Flickr API.

get.description: Edit a topic reply.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Pass in the group id to where the topic belongs. Can be NSID or group alias. Making this parameter optional for legacy reasons, but it is highly recommended to pass this in to get faster performance.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to edit the post with.

parameters.name: reply_id
parameters.description: The ID of the reply post to edit.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: The ID of the topic the post is in.

1.description: Topic not found - The topic_id is invalid

get.description: Get a list of replies from a group discussion topic.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Pass in the group id to where the topic belongs. Can be NSID or group alias. Making this parameter optional for legacy reasons, but it is highly recommended to pass this in to get faster performance.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: The ID of the topic to fetch replies for.

get.description: Get information about a group.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The NSID of the group to fetch information for.

parameters.name: group_path_alias
parameters.description: The path alias of the group. One of this or the group_id param is required

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the group name and description to fetch.  If the language is not found, the primary language of the group will be returned.Valid values are the same as in feeds.

get.description: Join a public group as a member.

parameters.name: accept_rules
parameters.description: If the group has rules, they must be displayed to the user prior to joining. Passing a true value for this argument specifies that the application has displayed the group rules to the user, and that the user has agreed to them. (See flickr.groups.getInfo).

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The NSID of the Group in question

1.description: Required arguments missing - The group_id doesnt exist

95.description: SSL is required - SSL is required to access the Flickr API.

96.description: Invalid signature - The passed signature was invalid.

97.description: Missing signature - The call required signing but no signature was sent.

98.description: Login failed / Invalid auth token - The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

99.description: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions - The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.

100.description: Invalid API Key - The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

105.description: Service currently unavailable - The requested service is temporarily unavailable.

106.description: Write operation failed - The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.

111.description: Format xxx not found - The requested response format was not found.

112.description: Method xxx not found - The requested method was not found.

114.description: Invalid SOAP envelope - The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.

115.description: Invalid XML-RPC Method Call - The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.

116.description: Bad URL found - One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

2.description: Group does not exist - The Group does not exist

3.description: Group not availabie to the account - The authed account does not have permission to view/join the group.

4.description: Account is already in that group - The authed account has previously joined this group

5.description: Membership in group is by invitation only. - Use flickr.groups.joinRequest to contact the administrations for an invitation.

6.description: User must accept the group rules before joining - The user must read and accept the rules before joining. Please see the accept_rules argument for this method.

10.description: Account in maximum number of groups - The account is a member of the maximum number of groups.

11.description: User unable to join - This user is unable to join this group.

get.description: Request to join a group that is invitation-only.

parameters.name: accept_rules
parameters.description: If the group has rules, they must be displayed to the user prior to joining. Passing a true value for this argument specifies that the application has displayed the group rules to the user, and that the user has agreed to them. (See flickr.groups.getInfo).

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The NSID of the group to request joining.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message to the administrators.

1.description: Required arguments missing - The group_id or message argument are missing.

4.description: Account is already in that group - The authed account has previously joined this group

5.description: Group is public and open - The group does not require an invitation to join, please use flickr.groups.join.

get.description:
Leave a group.rnrn

If the user is the only administrator left, and there are other members, the oldest member will be promoted to administrator.rnrn

If the user is the last person in the group, the group will be deleted.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: delete_photos
parameters.description: Delete all photos by this user from the group

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The NSID of the Group to leave

get.description: Get a list of the members of a group. The call must be signed on behalf of a Flickr member, and the ability to see the group membership will be determined by the Flickr members group privileges.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Return a list of members for this group.  The group must be viewable by the Flickr member on whose behalf the API call is made.

parameters.name: membertypes
parameters.description: Comma separated list of member types2: member3: moderator4: adminBy default returns all types.  (Returning super rare member type 1: narwhal isnt supported by this API method)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of members to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

get.description: Add a photo to a groups pool.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The NSID of the group whos pool the photo is to be added to.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: The id of the photo to add to the group pool. The photo must belong to the calling user.

100.description: Invalid API Key - The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

105.description: Service currently unavailable - The requested service is temporarily unavailable.

106.description: Write operation failed - The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.

111.description: Format xxx not found - The requested response format was not found.

112.description: Method xxx not found - The requested method was not found.

114.description: Invalid SOAP envelope - The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.

115.description: Invalid XML-RPC Method Call - The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.

116.description: Bad URL found - One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

2.description: Group not found - The group id passed was not a valid id for a group the user is a member of.

3.description: Photo already in pool - The specified photo is already in the pool for the specified group.

4.description: Photo in maximum number of pools - The photo has already been added to the maximum allowed number of pools.

5.description: Photo limit reached - The user has already added the maximum amount of allowed photos to the pool.

6.description: Your Photo has been added to the Pending Queue for this Pool - The pool is moderated, and the photo has been added to the Pending Queue. If it is approved by a group administrator, it will be added to the pool.

10.description: Maximum number of photos in Group Pool - A group pool has reached the upper limit for the number of photos allowed.

11.description: User unable to join - This user is unable to join this group.

7.description: Your Photo has already been added to the Pending Queue for this Pool - The pool is moderated, and the photo has already been added to the Pending Queue.

get.description: Returns a list of groups to which you can add photos.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of groups to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 400. The maximum allowed value is 400.

get.description: Returns a list of pool photos for a given group, based on the permissions of the group and the user logged in (if any).

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: extras
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are: description, license, date_upload, date_taken, owner_name, icon_server, original_format, last_update, geo, tags, machine_tags, o_dims, views, media, path_alias, url_sq, url_t, url_s, url_q, url_m, url_n, url_z, url_c, url_l, url_o

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The id of the group whos pool you which to get the photo list for.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A tag to filter the pool with. At the moment only one tag at a time is supported.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The nsid of a user. Specifiying this parameter will retrieve for you only those photos that the user has contributed to the group pool.

get.description: Remove a photo from a group pool.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your API application key. See here for more details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The NSID of the group whos pool the photo is to removed from.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: The id of the photo to remove from the group pool. The photo must either be owned by the calling user of the calling user must be an administrator of the group.

1.description: Group not found - The group_id passed did not refer to a valid group.

95.description: SSL is required - SSL is required to access the Flickr API.

get.description: Search for groups. 18+ groups will only be returned for authenticated calls where the authenticated user is over 18.
